snippet.title: Initial Daydream - Playdate RPG - December 1, 2023!
snippet.description:
Initial Daydream is an RPG being developed for the Playdate in Pulp. Paying homage to the early entries of Dragon Quest and Final Fantasy, Initial Daydream will have you traveling the world, exploring dungeons, and fighting monsters. 
This trailer premiered during the Tiny Yellow Machine October 2023 Playdate Direct: https://youtu.be/xoV-zXigJtg?si=0IraQjJMzwRfz5D4

https://itch.io/profile/james-gameboy
